name: Storyteller (itch) (Gray Miniature Games)
description: Storyteller is a simple dice game where you try to roll dice in ascending order, representing an successful story. Rolling dice in ascending order will earn story points. Use these story points to buy story tools, which can then be used to modify and rearrange dice. Win the game by telling an epic story (5 dice) scoring 20 story points or more. For a further challenge, try to win in as few turns as possible.
